title: Print, "Vue perspective de la Chambre à coucher du Cit. V à Paris, plate 13 in "Recueil des decorations intérieures"", 1812
medium: Etching and engraving on cream laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed in plate, lower center: Vue perspective de la Chambre a coucher du Cit. V. a Paris.; upper right corner: Pl. 13.
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: This image shows an interior of a bedroom.  The bed is draped and raised on a platform on the right side of the room opposite a large table with statue of a god in classical dress holding a wreath in his hand.

exhibitions.title: House Proud: 19th Century Watercolor Interiors from the Thaw Collection

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Vue perspective de la Chambre à coucher du Cit. V à Paris, plate 13 in "Recueil des decorations intérieures"", 1812.
1812. Etching and engraving on cream laid paper. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1921-6-377-14.
